content.content: 1. The following programs are prescribed for the purposes of the definition of “witness protection program” in subsection 7 (6) of the Act: 1. Ontario’s Witness Protection Program, administered by the Ministry of the Attorney General. 2. The OPP Witness Protection Program, administered by the Ontario Provincial Police.
content.raw_html:
1. The following programs are prescribed for the purposes of the definition of “witness protection program” in subsection 7 (6) of the Act:

1. Ontario’s Witness Protection Program, administered by the Ministry of the Attorney General.

2. The OPP Witness Protection Program, administered by the Ontario Provincial Police.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).    Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
